casebody.data:
TURPIN v. WM. A. TURPIN CO. et al. (Supreme Court, Appellate Division, First Department. April 24, 1914.)

Action by Dorothea R. Turpin, as administratrix, etc., against the William A. Turpin Company and others. No opinion. Motion granted, on condition stated in order. Order filed. See, also, 147 N. Y. Supp. 1146.
